name: Losedows 11 - Shooter Game
description:
One day, you turned on your computer and saw that there was a new Losedows upgrade. It seems like operating system forcing you to upgrade.

While upgrading, viruses and bugs took control of your computer!

Can you keep enemies away while the update is in process?

Can you successfully pass 3 different levels?

CAN YOU SURVIVE?

Maybe this is too difficult for you?

3 different games, 3 different controls, 3 different styles


This game made in 3 days for Stratera Games - Inhouse Game Jam #1 

by Polat Efe Kaya
